tinytweaks:config/plants/better_lily_pad: Allows boats to pass through lily pads without breaking them
Also allows entities to rise through the bottom of a lily pad
tinytweaks:config/plants/farmer_villager: Farmer villagers will deposit excess items into a nearby chest
tinytweaks:config/plants/easy_harvest/cr: Right clicking fully grown crops harvests and replants them
tinytweaks:config/plants/easy_harvest/su: Right clicking sugarcane harvests all sugarcane higher than the one you clicked
tinytweaks:config/plants/auto_planting/e: Plants that fall on their base block plant themselves
By default applies to saplings, wheat seeds, pumpkin seeds,
melon seeds, beetroot seeds, carrots, and potatoes
§7§oCan be modified with datapacks via the "plantable" tag
tinytweaks:config/plants/auto_planting/d: Delay (in ticks) before items plant themselves
tinytweaks:config/plants/leaves/collisio: When §aOn§r, leaves collide just like vanilla
tinytweaks:config/plants/leaves/persiste: These are leaves placed by the player
tinytweaks:config/plants/leaves/slow.com: Leaves slow non-item entities passing through them
tinytweaks:config/plants/leaves/climbing: Controls the speed at which you climb trees
1.0 is the default speed for ladders and vines
tinytweaks:config/plants/leaves/leaf_dec: Leaves decay X times faster, where X is whatever this is set to
tinytweaks:config/plants/rejuvenation/fr: Changes how high of an influence adjacent grass has on the chance of grass growing
§7§oRepresents the power of a pseudo-exponential function, so be careful
tinytweaks:config/plants/rejuvenation/lo: Long Grass to Short Grass Ratio
Percent of grass that can grow into tall grass
0.0 is disabled, 0.01 is default, 1.0 is all of them
tinytweaks:config/plants/rejuvenation/de: Dead bushes turn into saplings when on grass blocks
tinytweaks:config/plants/nether_rejuvena: Causes nylium, roots, and nether sprouts to spread
Only spread within their respective biomes
Changes how high of an influence adjacent roots have on the chance of roots growing
§7§oRepresents the power of a pseudo-exponential function, so be careful
0 is all sprouts and no roots, 100 is all roots and no sprouts
Only effects the Warped Forest biome
Percent chance of warped vines spawning
0.0 is never, 1.0 is every random tick
tinytweaks:config/animals/eat_crops.comm: Animals will break crop blocks that drop the food they like to eat
tinytweaks:config/misc/sturdy_lanterns.c: Gives lanterns a blast resistance of 6
tinytweaks:config/misc/mossy_things.comm: Cobblestone, stone bricks, and their stairs/slabs/walls turn mossy when near water or in rain
Mossy cobblestone, stone bricks, and their stairs/slabs/walls turn normal in sunlight
tinytweaks:config/misc/double_doors.comm: Doors and trapdoors open adjacent doors and trapdoors of the same type
Works when opened by hand or with redstone
tinytweaks:config/misc/bubble_columns_fl: When §aOn§r, bubble column blocks behave like vanilla
When §cOff§r, bubble column blocks will not spread to surrounding blocks like a normal water source block
tinytweaks:config/misc/infinite_cauldron: Right click a cauldron with a Heart of the Sea to make it infinite
tinytweaks:config/misc/easy_xp.comment: XP is given right to the player, instead of spawning experience orbs in the world
Right click an armor stand while sneaking to swap armor with it
tinytweaks:config/misc/automatic_doors.c: Wooden doors open and close automatically as you walk through them
tinytweaks:config/misc/soul_fire_damage_: Makes entities ignited by soul fire take an increased amount of damage while burning
tinytweaks:config/misc/flint_and_steel/e: Right click mobs with flint and steel to light them on fire
tinytweaks:preferences/plant_hitboxes.co: When §cOff§r, grasses, flowers, and tall seagrass have their hitboxes disabled
Hoes and shovels will destroy these blocks when used on grass blocks
Holding shears in your hand will show their hitboxes
tinytweaks:preferences/blue_soul_fire.co: Makes fire rendered on the hud and entities on fire blue when lit on fire by soul fire
tinytweaks:preferences/easy_harvest_drop: When §aOn§r, easy harvest drops items on the ground
When §cOff§r, easy harvest deposits items into your inventory
tinytweaks:preferences/labels/enabled.co: Looking at a chest, barrel, or shulker box renders its name above it
